title: Employing unlicensed driver
context: ยง286-134 Employing unlicensed driver. No person shall employ as a driver of a certain category of motor vehicle any person who is not licensed under this part to operate that category of motor vehicle. [L 1967, c 214, pt of ยง2; HRS ยง286-134; am L 1970, c 164, ยง3]
